commands.name: az servicebus topic authorization-rule create
commands.summary: Create an authorization rule for the specified topic.
examples: az servicebus topic authorization-rule create --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --topic-name mytopic --name myauthorule --rights Send Listen

commands.name: az servicebus topic authorization-rule delete
examples: az servicebus topic authorization-rule delete --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --topic-name mytopic --name myauthorule

commands.name: az servicebus topic authorization-rule list
commands.summary: List authorization rules for a topic.
examples: az servicebus topic authorization-rule list --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --topic-name mytopic

commands.name: az servicebus topic authorization-rule show
examples: az servicebus topic authorization-rule show --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --topic-name mytopic --name myauthorule

commands.name: az servicebus topic authorization-rule update
commands.summary: Update an authorization rule for the specified topic.
commands.syntax:
az servicebus topic authorization-rule update [--add]
                                              [--authorization-rule-name]
                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                              [--ids]
                                              [--namespace-name]
                                              [--remove]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--rights]
                                              [--set]
                                              [--subscription]
                                              [--topic-name]
examples: az servicebus topic authorization-rule update --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --topic-name mytopic --name myauthorule --rights Send
